column1:
Odeinoichus,"2020-12-04T11:11:53.27Z","Interesting Gift With Purchase.","

Set #5005239 Castle Room: When LEGO launched Unikitty a few months back during the Summer they included this giveaway on LEGO S&H, spend a certain amount on Unikitty sets and you would get this Polybag. Is it worth tracking down if you missed it? More than likely if you want every unique Unikitty facial prints.

column2: • Awesome giveaway with some fun builds and a cute looking unique Unikitty design.
• Special Unikitty Sticker Sheet included for additional detailing to decorate Unikitty’s room.
• Cardboard Element sturdy and includes a very nice looking design showing Unikitty’s house.
• Crab element included in set.
• Cardboard element difficult to fold just right to ensure tabs line up with slots.
• Models sit loosely around Cardboard element, lack of stable baseplate may cause models or elements to be lost over time.

column1: This set features some nice builds, the sofa model is a large colourful model that Unikitty can sit on fairly nicely. The aquarium model is a bit lacking since it isn’t completely enclosed, but it is serviceable. Unikitty has a breathtakingly cute new open smile closed eyes facial print that just looks awesome and is only available in this set. I’d recommend this one for fans of the Cloud Cuckoo Land spokes-kitty.
